name: Orchard Simulator
description:
Orchard Simulator will let create and run your own, successful orchard. Plant fruit trees, nuts & shrubs then take good care of them from soil preperation to picking and selling your fruits.

In Orchard Simulator you will

    + Decide what layout of plantation you will make,
    + Prepare and test your soil,
    + Plant your trees and make sure they don't die straight away,
    + Protect your plantation from pests and the weather,
    + Apply amendments and rip and cultivate the soil,
    + Hill up the surface soil,
    + Sow ryegrass onto the beds or let voluntary weeds develop,
    + Spray out ryegrass or weeds,
    + Take care of your tress, cut branches, correct growth,
    + Allow your trees to bloom,
    + Pick the fruit,
    + Sell your fruit to finance your orchard.

On easy, the game will guide you step by step, so you can learn how to run your orchard. For the hardcore player, we have the hard option which will give you no tips - only visable changes to your fruit.

Run the best orchard in town and rake the cash in from your perfect fruits.
